instruction.en:
1) Power on the device.
2) Set the Z-Wave network main controller into inclusion mode (see Z-Wave network controller operating manual).
3. Press and hold the Z-button for 3 seconds to add the motion sensor in secure mode.
4. If the inclusion is successful, the LED will blink fast for less than 5 seconds and then keep on for 3 seconds, otherwise the LED will blink fast for 5 seconds and then turn off, in which you need to repeat the process from step 2.

1) Power on the device.
2) Set the Z-Wave network main controller into removing mode (see Z-Wave network controller operating manual).
3) Triple click the Z-button
4) If the exclusion is successfull, the LED will keep on for 3 seconds.

hint.en:
1. Notification Report.
Sensor will send Notification Report to the associated nodes when Multisensor is removed or/and PIR is triggered.
2. Sensor Multilevel Report.
Multisensor will send Sensor Multilevel Report to the associated nodes at setting interval.
3. Battery Report.
Multisensor will send Battery Report when the battery level is low and the battery report’s value is 0xFF.
4. Device Reset Locally Notification.

1. Basic Set
Multisensor will send Basic Set to associated nodes when the PIR is triggered.
The higher the value is set, the more sensitive the PIR sensor are.

Period of time through which the PIR sensor is “blind” (insensitive) to motion. After this time period the PIR sensor will be again able to detect motion. The longer the insensitivity period, the longer the battery life. If the sensor is required to detect motion quickly, the time period may be shortened.
time (seconds) = value (3-60), time (minutes) = value/60 (61-28800)
Multisensor can send BASIC ON/OFF COMMAND CLASS to nodes associated with group 2.
Multisensor can reverse the BASIC ON/OFF.
Define a battery level as the “low battery”.

The interval of sending battery report to association device (Group Lifeline). The reports
are sent even if there are no changes in the battery level.

The interval of sending temperature report to association device (Group Lifeline). The reports
are sent even if there are no changes in the temperature level.

The interval of sending Humidity report to association device (Group Lifeline). The reports
are sent even if there are no changes in the humidity level.

The interval of sending luminance report to association device (Group Lifeline). The reports
are sent even if there are no changes in the luminance level.
The parameter determines the change in battery level resulting in battery report being sent to the main controller.
The parameter determines the change in temperature level resulting in temperature report being sent to the main controller.(Degrees Celsius)
The parameter determines the change in humidity level resulting in humidity report being sent to the main controller.
The parameter determines the change in luminance level resulting in luminance report being sent to the main controller.
